entry.tran: 秘密的;鬼祟的;偷偷摸摸的
entry.def: If you describe someone as sneaky, you disapprove of them because they do things secretly rather than openly.

example.ex: It is a sneaky and underhand way of doing business...
example.tran: 这种做生意的方式偷偷摸摸，遮遮掩掩。

example.ex: One kid can generally tell when another kid is sneaky.
example.tran: 一个小孩鬼鬼祟祟地在干什么事情的时候，通常另一个小孩可以判断出来。

sentences.sentence: "achieved success in business only by underhand methods"

means.word_mean: 2. marked by quiet and caution and secrecy; taking pains to avoid being observed;
